Title.Language: The Conclusion of the Adam Theotokia

Comment.Language: The Conclusion of the Theotokia is chanted in the Hosanna tune:

Text.Language: Niteltil/ m~mounhwou: ce/p n~totk t/rou: pikesw n~te v~iom: ce,/ nahren nekbal.
All the raindrops: are counted by You: and the sand of the sea: is before Your eyes.
قطرات المطر محصاة عندك جميعها ورمل البحر كائن أمام عينيك.
Ie au/r mallon: ninobi n~te ta'u,/: nai eyouwnh e~bol: m~pekm~yo Pa[oic.
How much more are: the sins of my soul: manifest before You: O my Lord.
فكم بالحرى خطايا نفسى هذه الظاهرة أمامك ياربى.
Ninobi e~taiatou: Pao#c# n~nekerpoumeui~: oude m~per]h~y/k: e~naa~nomia.
The sins that I have committed: do not remember my Lord: and do not count: my iniquities.
الخطايا التى صنعتها ياربى لا تذكرها ولا تحسب آثامى.
Je pitelwn/c akcotpf: ]porn/ akcw] m~moc: piconi etcaoui~nam: Pao#c# akerpefmeui~.
For You have chosen the publican: and the adulteress You have saved: and the right hand thief: My Lord You have remembered.
فان العشار اخترته والزانية خلصتها واللص اليمين ياسيدى ذكرته.
Anok hw Pao#c#: qa pirefernobi: mat~caboi n~tai~ri: n~oumeta~noia.
And I too: the sinner: teach me O my Lord: to offer repentance.
وأنا أيضاً الخاطئ ياسيدى علمنى أن أصنع توبة.
Je ,~ouws m~v~mou an: m~pirefernobi: m~v~r/] n~teftacyof: n~tecwnq n~je tef'u,/.
For You do not desire: the death of a sinner: but rather that he returns: and that his soul may live.
لأنك لا تشأ موت الخاطئ مثل أن يرجع وتحيا نفسه.
Matacyon V]: e~qoun e~pekoujai: a~rioui~ neman: kata tekmeta~gayoc.
Restore us O God: to Your salvation: and deal with us: according to Your goodness.
رُدنا يا الله إلى خلاصك وعاملنا كصلاحك.
Je n~yok oua~gayoc: ouoh n~na/t: maroutahon n~,wlem: n~je nekmetsenh/t.
For You are good: and merciful: let Your compassions: speedily come to us.
لأنك أنت صالح ورحوم فلتدركنا رأفاتك سريعاً.
Senh/t qaroun t/ren: Po#c# V] Pencwt/r: ouoh nai nan: kata peknis] n~nai. \
Have compassion upon us all: O Lord God our Savior: and have mercy upon us: according to Your great mercy.
ترأف علينا كلنا أيها الرب الإله مخلصنا وارحمنا كعظيم رحمتك.
Nai k~i~ri m~poumeui~: w~ penn/b P,#c#: eke~swpi qen tenm/]: ekws e~bol ekjw m~moc.
Remember those: O Christ our Master: be among us: and proclaim and say.
هؤلاء أذكرهم ياسيدنا المسيح كن فى وسطنا صارخاً قائلا.
Je tahir/n/ a~nok: ]] m~moc nwten: t~hir/n/ m~Paiwt: ],w m~moc nemwten.
My peace I: give to You: the peace of my Father: I leave with you.
سلامى أنا أعطيكم سلام أبى أتركه معكم.

Comment.Language: The hymn is concluded with the "Hymn of Joy (Pouro)," in its festive tune:
